name: Shark Bait
description:
Welcome!

SHARK BAIT is a Local co-op game for 1-4 players, set under the ocean where you play as sharks competing to eat the most fish! 

You can choose between the Hammerhead, Great White, Mako and Whale shark. All four sharks have two separate abilities, one for eating fish and one for interfering with other players! No shark has the same ability and all have different speeds! 

The game is currently still in beta, and we hope to release it not to far into the future. There are still some bug fixes that need to be sorted, if you find any please let us know through the survey below:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSds4WZs0YKlYJhxL1z3ZOa5K9tVf6spL1asg_ym...

Follow us here:
https://www.facebook.com/CosmoPodStudios/
https://www.instagram.com/cosmopod.studios/
